title: Fps drops
body: So i have micro fps drops but the real problem is why is league consuming like 80% of my cpu?? a couple patches ago it barely used 30% wtf??? do you reall suck that much at optimizing this game??

replies.body:
Peculiar. The 2200G is a single-CCX processor, so it is not the inter-CCX latency issue with the windows scheduler (being a trashfire), which is a huge issue with a couple games, LoL included. If it was an R5 1600 or 2600, there is a program that can fix it by containing the game to a single core cluster.

High reported CPU usage on a low core count CPU without SMT is normal, though.

Are you using unlimited fps, or a framelimiter/vsync? Without a limiter, CPU load increases drastically from higher framerates, and as a result the OS typically scheduler splits up threads across more cores to handle the load (which raises the reported utilization), on top of the load itself increasing.
